roleset.name: imitate
roleset.note: MIMIC-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mimic' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from mimic.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: straightforward
example.text: At one point, almost all of the shares in the 20-stock Major Market Index, which *trace* mimics the industrial average, were sharply higher.
